donate().notice: Sends balance of this contract to the OptimismPortal. on the Mantle Mainnet, this function will donate ETH and MNT

userdoc.notice: The PortalSender is a simple intermediate contract that will transfer the balance of the         L1StandardBridge to the OptimismPortal during the Bedrock migration.
